title: Modded Landing Page (Tabs introduced! Landing, YouTube, Facebook, News, and More!)
body:
Want to see the file used? Check the link above.

Tutorial:
Go to C:\Riot Games\RADS\projects\lol_air_client_oc1\releases\**VERSION**\deploy\
open 'Lol.properties' with notepad++ (http://notepad-plus-plus.org/ )
change 'lobbyLandingURL=blahblahblah' to 'lobbyLandingURL=https://www.dropbox.com/s/yd0vir1288x7eg9/landing.htm?dl=1'
save file
restart lol
Done! Enjoy custom page. (WIP!!!!)

If anybody has problems with the dropbox link, ill add some other links to the page.
**VERSION** is your client version. Navigate to \releases\ and you'll see your releases. As of this post, the release number is 0.0.0.12

Riot pls no patcherino
